Glottal stop in word initial position is not phonemic and has not been transcribed in that position. It is phonemic in word medial and final position. There is a phonemic distinction between schwa and e/ɛ and a/ɑ. There is no phonemic distinction between the o-ɔ, e-ɛ and a-ɑ.
